description: My website where you'll find all my latest projects and, also, a little bit about who I am.

hero.headline: Hi! My name is Elias Pereyra

second-col.and: and with a great taste for

work.title: What I do
work.first-desc: Fullstack Web Developer with experience in web development, with great taste in design. I'm aware of the latest improvements that arise in the field of software development to improve my abilities and my works.
work.second-desc: In addition to web development, I do a volunteering, making open source contributions in translating article to spanish in the community of freeCodeCamp. You can see the latest articles I've translated

personal.title: My personal side
personal.first-desc: One of the characteristic that stands out in me is curiosity. I like to investigate and learn things in depth. For this reason, I also have a great taste for low-level programming and system programming.
personal.second-desc: However, in addition to this, I like to put in practice the concepts I learn. I like to be open-minded and flexible, so I can expand my knowledge.

contact.title: Would you like to work with me?
contact.comment: Currently I'm up for work. Contact me. Send me a message and let's chat about your proposal.
